mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_ID AS boardId ,B.BOARD_TITLE AS boardTitle ,B.CONTENT AS content ,B.CREATE_DATE AS createDate ,B."LIKE" AS "like" ,B.MOIM_ID AS moimId ,B.MEMBER_ID AS memberId ,M.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName ,J.JOB_NAME AS jobName FROM BOARDS B JOIN MEMBERS M ON B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN MOIM_PARTICIPANTS P ON M.MEMBER_ID = P.MEMBER_ID JOIN JOBS J ON P.JOB_ID = J.JOB_ID WHERE B.MOIM_ID = #{id} ORDER BY B.CREATE_DATE DESC
